description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) to vary condition 2 (change drawing) of planning permission ref: 215780FUL dated 17/12/2021 (as amended by application ref: 250166NMA dated 14/02/2025) for: 'Redevelopment of site to create 8no. self-contained flats and central courtyard at first floor level; construction of second floor with habitable roof space to front of building; construction of two additional floors to rear of building; first floor rear extension; installation of 4no. rooflights to front roof slope; and provision of associated balconies, terraces, cycle and refuse storage '. Amendment seeks to revise wording of the approved description of development and reduction in the number of self-contained flats to 7 self-contained flats and construction of one additional floor to rear of building and associated internal alterations.
